Service Details: Provides activities for kids, environmental displays, visitor, park and trail information, children's play area, and environmental resource library * offers various exhibits such as Unbelievable Bees and the Kokanee exhibit, Story Time at the EECO for 3-4 year olds and their caregivers, Discovery Backpacks, Spring Break Camps for ages 5-7and Summer Nature Camps for ages 3-7 * please call for details on any of our programs
How to Apply: Please phone to register for programs
Cost: Admission by donation * some programs are free * please phone to inquire about cost
Address & Map: 2363A Springfield RdKelowna, BC     V1X 7N7View MapQuest Map
